description: Often, a soldier would carry a secondary weapon in addition to his primary weapon of choice, to be drawn when the primary weapon has failed or been broken. The Scythian Akinakes was side arm that had a long triangular blade. Akīnakah were prized weapons, some gilded in gold and studded with jewels. Many such weapons have been found in steppe burials and tumuli stretching from the Black Sea to the Altai Moountains.
requirementsTooltip: Unlocked in Town Phase. Requires “Forging” or “Metallurgy.”
